Row.Text: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Tropical tiles in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with at least 8 Urban Population.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:CITY_URBAN] Urban Districts in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital. Repeatable.
